title: RLumModel: Solving Ordinary Differential Equations to Understand Luminescence
notes: The initial development was financed through the project 'Modelling quartz luminescence signal dynamics relevant for dating and dosimetry' (DFG SCHM 305114-1)

description: A collection of functions to simulate luminescence signals in quartz and Al2O3 based on published models.
